Tallahassee.Don Veller Seminole Golf: The Don Veller Seminole Golf Course and Club is located in Tallahassee, Florida and is the home of the Florida State Seminoles men's golf and Florida State Seminoles women's golf teams. It was constructed in 1962 by the architect Bill Amick. In 2015 James Hancock renovated the facility to a 7,147-yard (6,535 m) par 73 course.
